author: bridge-bot
content:
<Highlander1969> For those interested, the L2 Standards WG will be discussing     tomorrow (November 27, at 7 am PT / 10 am ET / 15:00 GMT / 16:00 CET / 6:30 pm IST ) 

PR for L2 Transaction Status standard: https://github.com/ethereum-oasis-op/L2/pull/55

PR for L2 Transaction Fee API standard: https://github.com/ethereum-oasis-op/L2/pull/53

Meeting zoom link is here:
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/81599021689?pwd=VmxPVUNCVmE5RkkweGY1YmN1OWMrZz09
